page.title: 03BURROUGH-ON-THE-HILL WI
page.content: THIS IS A COUNTRYWOMENS ORGANISATION WHICH MEETS ONCE A MONTH IN SOMERBY VILLAGE HALL BECAUSE THERE IS NO VILLAGEHALL IN BURROUGH. THE INSTITUTRE RMED IN 1922 AND HAS 24 MEMBERS, A COMMITTEE OF 8 PEOPLE AND THE ANNUAL SUBSCIPTION IS L4.00. 1985 PROGRAMME JAN. LACE MAKING, FEB. ITS MAGIC MAR. TRUE OR FALSE APR. COOKERY DEMONSTRATION, MAY RESOLUTION MEETING JUN. THE NATIONAL TRUST JUL. ANTIQUE DOLLS AUG.GAMES AND BARBECUE AT PRESIDENTS HOME. SEP. VISIT LOROS DAY CENTRE. OCT. CREATIVE EMBROIDERY NOV. ANNUAL MEETING DEC. CHRISTMAS JOLLIFICATIONS!
